title: 36b05 - Reforestation.
text:
Reforestation – the provisions of the field
sanitation standards are applicable to reforestation activities.  It is similar
to other agricultural field operations.  Several courts have held that employees
engaged in reforestation are covered by legislation for the protection of
agricultural workers, and finally, the most common method of performing
reforestation activities is by hand-labor operations. Bresgal v. Brock, 833 F.2d 763 (1987); Davis Forestry Corp. v. Smith, 707 F. 2d 1325, 1328
n. 3 (1983);OSHA Memorandum July 30, 1990
